title: Perma banned for nothing?
body:
[link to chat logs](https://imgur.com/QO3vwFV)

I just logged in today and i was playing a game last night with a group of toxic people so i told the enemy team in all chat to please report them and now i am perma banned?

replies.body:
premades can't get you permabanned because 1 report = 5 reports = 9 reports

And you not wanting to post chat logs just makes me believe that you said something that's against the rules but don't want to admit it

Also, asking for reports is reportable and combined with enough toxicity can lead to a punishment

Edit: And looking at the pic you posted
100% deserved ban

> [{quoted}](name=Arcade Lulu,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=JukrEL1f,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-10T21:03:43.562+0000)
>
> premades can't get you permabanned because 1 report = 5 reports = 9 reports
> 
> And you not wanting to post chat logs just makes me believe that you said something that's against the rules but don't want to admit it
> 
> Also, asking for reports is reportable and combined with enough toxicity can lead to a punishment

He did post dem logs this time. 
there's a lot of hatespeech in them

"perma banned for nothing"
 Meanwhile: 

* Harassing other players
* Insulting other players
* Hatred towards Spanish people
* Wishing mass genocide on Spanish people

And that's just at the START of the log (in Pre-Game) apparently.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

I'd say the ban was warranted. Sorry.
I think wishing genocide against the people of Spain is pretty out of line

As there is no productive discussion that can come from this thread, it has been locked.

If you have questions or concerns about this action please visit us in the [Moderation Discord here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).
 
~ Ulanopo

You posted this [yesterday](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/lbXYTA7t-got-perma-banned-for-nothing) as well. There is no need to repost the same content a day later.
Lmao that title though. I dont get why you lie about it, as if anyone knows you anyways.
